task.role: You are a Senior Frontend Engineer with expertise in React, TypeScript, and modern UI/UX. Implement Task 19 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Create interactive Kanban board UI for task management with real-time updates via WebSocket
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Build Kanban board layout with columns for todo/in-progress/done 2. Implement drag-and-drop using @dnd-kit/core for task status updates 3. Create task card components with edit/delete actions 4. Add WebSocket integration for real-time task updates 5. Implement task filtering and search functionality 6. Add mobile-responsive design for touch interactions

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-19): Implement Kanban board with drag-and-drop

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Test drag-and-drop functionality, verify real-time updates, validate mobile responsiveness and touch gestures
